_metadata.description: Git Control Tower requirement registry - Parent-level requirements reference child modules declared under imports

requirements.title: P0 operational targets - Core git API functionality
requirements.description: Tracks all P0 requirements for production readiness including health checks, repository status, file diffs, staging operations, commit composition, push/pull status, audit logging, and CLI parity.

validation.notes: Unit tests for all P0 API endpoints

requirements.title: P1 operational targets - Extended functionality
requirements.description: Tracks P1 requirements including branch operations, AI-assisted commit messages, conflict detection, and change preview with impact analysis.

validation.notes: Unit tests for all P1 API endpoints

requirements.title: P2 operational targets - Web UI and future expansion
requirements.description: Tracks P2 requirements including web UI dashboard, worktree management, and stash operations.

validation.notes: Manual testing of web UI dashboard
